Name: Convergence Compulsion
About the game: Convergence Compulsion is an arcade-style, score-attack game that balances thinking fast and planning ahead. Converge on the wave that matches your color. Explode into a new color. Get points, earn power-ups, and blast your way to a high score! Move quickly, or you'll get consumed by the wrong wave! But don't stray too far, or you'll never get back for that matching color! Each time you match, an obstacle appears, and after you string more matches together, you'll get power-ups! Key Features Blast, shoot, scoot, and smash— Clear a path to your next high score with an arsenal of power-ups that you can use alone or together. Unlock dozens of secrets— Discover the codes that grant you power-up tricks, character cosmetics, and more. Climb to the top— Face off against your friends, and the world, as you vie for the highest of high scores. Track your progress— Celebrate locally tracked gameplay milestones and unlock achievements to show off your prowess. Play your way— Tailor the game with loads of options from configurable controls to customizable colors.
